keyPolicies.policyDescription: Britain needs fresh vision and leadership to restore fairness in our country. The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone, not just the richest.
The Liberal Democrats will take the urgent action needed to protect our environment, making Britain a world leader in renewable energy and green technology.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Invest in Schools and Our NHS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will invest part of the £50 billion 'Remain Dividend' for our schools and put 1p on income tax for our NHS and social care.
End the Brexit mess and keep the best deal we already have and stay in Europe.

mentions.candidate: Alison Bennett lives in Arundel & South Downs. In May she defeated the Conservatives in a Tory stronghold in the local elections. She knows how to win here.

issues.brexitEurope: Alison and the Liberal Democrats will stop Brexit so that we can build a brighter future in Arundel and South Downs. End the Brexit mess and keep the best deal we already have and stay in Europe.
issues.economy: Britain needs fresh vision and leadership to restore fairness in our country. The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone, not just the richest.
issues.education: Invest in Schools and Our NHS. We will invest part of the £50 billion 'Remain Dividend' for our schools.
issues.environment: The Liberal Democrats will take the urgent action needed to protect our environment, making Britain a world leader in renewable energy and green technology.
issues.health: Invest in Schools and Our NHS. We will put 1p on income tax for our NHS and social care.

leaflet.personalStatement: Alison is not a career politician, only becoming active in politics after the EU referendum; since then she has been fighting to remain in the EU.

politicalExperience.achievements: Defeated the Conservatives in a Tory stronghold in the local elections.

examples: GAiNED over 700 new councillors in May's local elections.

End the Brexit mess and keep the best deal we already have and stay in Europe.
